title: Honor help
body: So prior to season starting i was honor 5, blah blah blah everything reset, i'm currently at honor 2 and have been on the "last checkpoint" before honor 3 for over a week now, whilst playing i've gone several games in a row being honored, how the hell am i meant to actually get past this checkpoint when getting honored constantly and consistently apparently isn't enough ?

replies.body: It takes a while, the checkpoints were added so there wasn't as much of a gap between rewards, but it still takes a while to level up.
